characters: Driver of the self-driving vehicle, motorcyclists, truck driver
summary: In this segment, the self-driving vehicle is traveling on a rural road. Multiple motorcyclists are seen ahead, and a large orange truck is parked on the right side of the road. The truck driver is standing next to the truck, and another person is seen near the truck. The motorcyclists are moving forward, and the self-driving vehicle is approaching the truck.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while approaching the truck parked on the right side of the road. The vehicle is keeping a safe distance from the motorcyclists ahead.
key_objects: 1) Front: Multiple motorcyclists, approximately 20-30 meters away, moving forward. 2) Right: A large orange truck, approximately 5 meters away, parked on the roadside. 3) Right: A person standing next to the truck, approximately 5 meters away, stationary.
